name: Bouillon Of Wild Mushrooms And Coriander
keywords: appetizer, coriander, shiitake, wild mushrooms, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 cup mixed wild mushrooms, stemmed and thinly sliced

recipeInstructions.text: Place the shiitakes, garlic, onion, tomatoes, coriander stems and water in a large pot. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 1 hour. Strain the broth through a fine sieve lined with cheesecloth. Cleanthe pot, add the broth and place over medium-high heat. Simmer rapidly until reduced to 2 cups, about 20 minutes. Strain again. Return the broth to the pot, season with 1 teaspoon salt and pepper and keep hot.

Heat the Madeira in a medium skillet over medium heat. Add the wild mushrooms and cook until softened, about 3 minutes. Season with the remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt and pepper. Divide the mushrooms and the coriander leaves among 4 bowls. Ladle in the broth and serve immediately.
